ygData.subject: Re: Shin Gauntlets and Greaves
ygData.msgSnippet: Uldar, I have a map of Guk-but which entrance to lower do you go for the greaves and gloves? Scanna Swiftsinger ... From: jasroc@home.com  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Uldar, I have a map of Guk-but which entrance to lower do you go for the
greaves and gloves?
Scanna Swiftsinger
-----Original Message-----
From: jasroc@... <jasroc@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, November 29, 1999 4:42 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Shin Gauntlets and Greaves


>From: jasroc@...
>
>
>So, My advice to young bards, Get a map, enter Guk, go invis, trot down to
Lower Guk and wait. I could have looted 2 more gloves and greaves from
corpses at the exit. Plus, even if you can't complete the quests just yet,
the gloves(AC 7,+5poison Wt5) and greaves(AC 10,+5disease,Wt7.7) are nice
(plus they look cool).
>
>Uldar Ulfangson
>32nd Bard, Rodcet Nife
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
